source.name: `Edit` API call
source.instructions: **What is the purpose of the `instruction` argument in the`Edit` API call?**

answers.answer: It specifies the input text to be edited.
It specifies the name of the model to use for editing.
It provides additional options for controlling the editing process
It tells the AI how to edit the prompt.

source.guidance: The `Edit` API call would take the instruction argument to serve a similar purpose: providing guidance to the model about what kind of response is expected. In other words, it tells the AI how to edit the prompt.
